channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ark-commenteditor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- ark-commenteditor

item.title: CVE-2021-4227|2024-08-03T17:23:08.904Z -- unknown -- ark-commenteditor
item.description: The ark-commenteditor WordPress plugin through 2.15.6 does not properly sanitise or encode the comments when in Source editor, allowing attackers to inject an iFrame in the page and thus load arbitrary content from any page to the comment section
